description: Talk to the boy.

2.step: Search the northern potted plank for a key and enter.

description: Right-click the potted plant, and select 'Look under'.

3.step: Search the cupboard to get a Magnet. (Equip Leather gloves)

description: Go downstairs into the basement.
If you don't have leather gloves, search the boxes.
You must wear gloves to enter the gate.
Search the cupboard to get a Magnet.
Read all the pages of the diary.

5.step: Drop the cheese and use the magnet on the mouse.

description: Drop the cheese in the southern room,
then use the cheese on the mouse by the mouse hole.

6.subtitle: Retrieving the ball.
6.step: Search the fountain for a key.

description: Go around the garden avoiding the witch's view,
if you get caught you will need another cheese to get back.
Search the fountain for a key.

7.step: Use the key on shed door.

description: Use the key found from the fountain on the shed door.

8.step: Kill the Witch's experiment four times.

description: Stand on the skavid while it is on the south tile from the right corner to potentially force it to the corner.
Recommend to just kill it and tank the hits since there is a one-third chance of it moving to the right corner.
Stand on the skavid while it is on the south tile from the right corner to potentially force it to the corner.
Recommend to just kill it and tank the hits since there is a one-third chance of it moving to the right corner.
Stand by the south wall of the shed.
Stand by the south wall of the shed.

9.step: Take the ball and talk to the boy.

description: Take the ball on the crate.
Talk to the boy.

10.step: Quest complete!

description: Almera

2.step: Board the raft, talk to the boy, then swim to shore.

description: Board the raft.
Talk to Hudon.
Right click the river and swim to shore.

3.step: Go upstairs, search a bookcase for the Book of baxtorian, and open the book.

location: inside a house north from where you wash ashore.
description: Go upstairs

location: upstairs in a house north from where you wash ashore.
description: Search this bookcase to find the Book of baxtorian and open the book.

4.subtitle: Glarial's Pebble
4.step: Talk to Golrie to get Glarial's pebble.

description: Climb down the ladder.
Search this crate for a key.
Use the key on the prison door.
Talk to Golrie to obtain Glarial's pebble.

5.step: Use Glarial's pebble on the tombstone and get Glarial's amulet and Glarial's urn.

location: south-east from the Baxtorian Falls waterfall.
description: Use the Pebble on the tombstone. Note: Runes, weapons, or armour are not allowed in this dungeon. Drop them outside the tomb and pick it back up when you are done.
Search a chest for a Glarial's amulet.
Search Glarial's tomb for a Glarial's urn.

6.subtitle: Hidden Treasures
6.step: Board the raft, use the rope on the rock then the dead tree. Enter the Waterfall dungeon

description: Board the raft.
Use a rope on the rock.
Use a rope on the dead tree.
Open the ledge and enter the Waterfall dungeon.

7.step: Get a key from a crate and use the key on both doors to get into the Chalice of Eternity room.

description: Obtain the key from this crate.
Use the key on the first door to the Chalice of Eternity room.
Use the key on the second door to the Chalice of Eternity room.

8.step: Use an air rune, a water rune, and an earth rune on each of the six pillars.

description: Use an air rune, a water rune, and an earth rune on each of the six pillars. Note: If you do this incorrectly you will be washed out the dungeon.

9.step: Use Glarial's amulet on the Statue of Glarial, then use Glarial's urn on the Chalice of Eternity.

description: Use Glarial's amulet on the Statue of Glarial
Use Glarial's urn on the Chalice of Eternity.

10.step: Quest complete!

description: Go through the maze to talk to King Bolren.

2.subtitle: Getting back the stolen orbs.
2.step: Talk to Commander Montai three times. (Chat: 1-2)

description: Talk to Commander Montai to help him gather logs (1).
Talk to him again and give him 6 logs.
Once again, talk to him and agree to find all 3 trackers (2).

3.step: Talk to all three trackers

description: Tracker gnome 3 will give you a riddle for the balista.
list: 'More than my head less than my fingers' is 2.
'More than we but less than our feet' is 3.

description: Tracker gnome 1

location: at the east side in the jail
description: Tracker gnome 2
Fire the ballista with the coordinate being the answer to the riddle. If you miss you can try again until you get it.
list: 'More than my head less than my fingers' is 2.
'More than we but less than our feet' is 3.

5.step: Climb over the destroyed stronghold, go upstairs, and search the chest for an orb.

description: Climb over the destroyed stronghold.
After climbing over there will be a short period where you won't be able to eat, while a Khazard Commander attacks you. He is capable of stacking up to 20 damage.
Climb upstairs to get to the chest.
Search the chest and take the orb of protection.

6.step: Follow Elkoy and talk to King Bolren. (Chat: 1)

description: Right click Elkoy and select 'follow' to get to the centre of Tree Gnome Village.
Talk to King Bolren (1).

7.step: Defeat Khazard warlord to get two orbs.

description: Talk to the Khazard warlord and prepare to fight after the dialog is finished.
Lure him west of the dead tree until he is directly west of it.
Walk west until he stops following you and then stand directly south-west from him and attack him.

8.subtitle: Finishing up
8.step: Talk to King Bolren. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to King Bolren (1).

9.step: Quest complete!

description: He will give you a Bark sample and a Translation book.
Hazelmere will take your Bark Sample and give you a Hazelmere's scroll.

3.step: Talk to King Narnode. (Chat: 1-5-5-2-1-4)

description: The message from Hazelmere's scroll translate to:
list: 'A man came to me with the King's seal.'
'And Daconia rocks will kill the tree!'

location: Upstairs south from the Grand Tree
description: Glough claims that humans are planning to invade the gnomes and can't be trusted. He tells you to speak to the King.

5.step: Talk to King Narnode.

description: The King says that Glough captured a human with Daconia rocks and that he is imprisoned at the top floor of the Grand Tree.

6.step: Talk to Charlie.

location: Top floor of the Grand Tree
description: Charlie says that he was paid by Glough to retrieve some rocks from a gnome and got imprisoned for it.

7.subtitle: Investigating Glough
7.step: Search Glough's cupboard for a journal then talk to Glough

location: Upstairs south from the Grand Tree
description: Open and search the cupboard for Glough's journal.

location: Upstairs south from the Grand Tree
description: After talking to Glough you will be escorted to prison for accusing him for paying Charlie to take Daconia rocks.

8.step: Talk to Charlie.

location: Top floor of the Grand Tree
description: Charlie tells you to talk to the Karamja Shipyard foremen to find out whats going on.

9.step: Talk to Captain Errdo to travel to Karamja. (Chat: 1)

location: Top floor of the Grand Tree
description: Travel to Karamja.
You will crash land in east Karamja. Jogres will automatically attack you. Head east to the Shipyard.

10.step: Open the gate and a worker will stop you. (Chat: 2-1-2-2)

description: The password is Ka-Lu-Min.

11.step: Defeat the Foreman for a Lumber Order.

description: Defeat him for a Lumber Order.

location: Top floor of the Grand Tree
description: He will suggests you to talk to Anita.

13.step: Talk to Anita for a key.

location: Upstairs at most north-west staircase of the Grand Tree
description: She will give you a key to Glough's chest.

14.step: Use Glough's key on his chest.

location: Upstairs south from the Grand Tree
description: You will obtain Invasion plans after opening the chest.
He is still not convinced but gives you sticks found in Glough's home.

16.subtitle: Defeating Glough
16.step: Climb up Glough's watchtower, use sticks on all four pillars to spell out 'TUZO', then climb down the trapdoor.

location: Upstairs south from the Grand Tree
description: Climb up the tree branch to get into Glough's watchtower. (This requires 25 Agility)
Use all four sticks on the pillars to spell out TUZO
Prepare to fight a Black demon (level 172) then climb down the trapdoor.
After the cutscene, take one step north to successfully safespot the Black Demon.
You will tell him what happened and he will ask you to search the roots for Daconia rocks.

19.step: Search the roots for a Daconia rock.

description: Search around the area until ypo get a message saying you found the rocks. Note that the it is in a different spot for every person.
Talk to the King to finish the quest.
Lady Servil will ask you to rescue her son.

2.step: Open and search chest to get Khazard armour. Equip it and head to the prison.

description: Search this chest to get Khazard armour.

3.subtitle: Rescuing the boy
3.step: Talk to the boy, Jeremy Servil.

description: He will ask you to get the keys from a guard.

4.step: Right-click and talk to the Khazard Guard.

description: He will tell you to get him a Khali Brew.

5.step: Talk to the barman for a Khaili brew for 5gp. (Chat: 2)

description: Buy a Khali brew for 5gp.

6.step: Right-click and give the Khazard guard the Khali Brew and get keys.

description: He will give you the prison keys to Jeremy cell.

7.step: Talk to Jeremy Servil.

description: You will find yourself in the arena so prepare yourself to fight a Ogre (level 63).

8.subtitle: Fight Arena
8.step: Kill the ogre (level 63).

description: Stand by the pile of bones to safespot the ogre. Talk to Justin Servil if the fight doesn't start.

9.step: Talk to Kangrad.

description: Finish talking to Kangrad to start a cut scene back to the arena.

10.step: Kill Scorpion (level 44) and Hellhound (level 137).

description: Stand by the pile of bones to safespot the Scorpion. Talk to Justin Servil if the fight doesn't start.
Stand by the pile of bones to safespot the hellhound.

11.subtitle: Finishing up
11.step: Run from General Khazard (level 112) and talk to Lady Servil.

description: Talk to her to finish the quest.
Climb up the staircase.
He will give you an Air talismen.
Climb down the stairs.
Give him the Air talismen and he will give you a Research package to give to Aubury.

3.step: Talk to Aubury twice. (Chat: 3)

description: Talk to him twice for notes to give to Sedridor.
Climb down the stairs.
Talk to him to finish the quest.

5.step: Quest complete!

req.name: Requirements
items: Defeat Temple Guardian dog (Level 30) without Magic.

description: He will tell you to check the Temple.
Right-click the large door, and select 'Knock-at'.

3.step: Kill the Temple Guardian.

description: The Temple Guardian is unaffected by magic,
but can be killed by melee or range.
You can either range or melee flinch to avoid taking any damage.
He will tell you to go back to the Temple.

5.subtitle: Rescue Denzel
req:: 25 Pure essence and Rune essence unnoted
5.step: Talk to Denzel. (Chat: 2-1)

description: Open the door.
Climb up the staircase.
Climb up the ladder.
Right click the prison door and select 'Talk-through'

6.step: Kill a level 30 Monk of Zamorak to get a Golden key.

description: Can be safespotted between the pews.

7.step: Study the monuments until you find a key then use the golden key on that monument to get a silver key.

description: Study every monument because it is in a different spot for everyone.

8.step: Use the bucket on the well.

description: Study every monument because it is in a different spot for every player.

9.step: Use the Iron key on the prison door.

description: Use the key on the prison door.

10.step: Talk to Drezel.

description: He will bless your water to use on the coffin.

11.step: Use the Blessed water on the coffin.

description: Now use the blessed water on the coffin.

12.subtitle: Finishing up
12.step: Go to the monument room to talk to Drezel and give him 50 unnoted Rune or Pure essence.

description: Talk to Drezel twice to give him the essence
He tells you to travel to Pollnivneach to look for his nephew.

2.step: Buy a Kharidian headpiece and a Fake beard then combine them.

description: Buy a Kharidan headpiece and a Fake Beard from Ali Morrisane then combine them for a Desert disguise.

3.subtitle: Pollnivneach
3.step: Give 3 beers to Drunken Ali. (Go through the dialogue)

description: Go through the dialogue or you will have to buy another beer from the Barman.

4.step: Talk to a Bandit and a Menaphite Thug.

description: Right-click click talk to a Bandit.
Right-click click talk to a Menaphite Thug.

5.step: Talk to Ali the Camel Man (Chat: 4-2-3).

description: Buy two camels for 500gp for both gangs. He will give you two receipts.

6.step: Talk to a Bandit and a Menaphite Thug to give them a Receipt.

description: Right-click click talk to a Bandit to give him a receipt.
Right-click click talk to a Menaphite Thug to give him a receipt.

7.subtitle: Pickpocketing
7.step: Talk to Ali the Operator (Chat: 1-2).

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Ask him to join his gang.

8.step: Pickpocket a Villager then talk to Ali the Operator (Chat: 1-2).

description: You will be able to pickpocket a villager once until you talk to Ali to get a blackjack.

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Ask him for advice to continue pickpocketing.

9.step: Talk and pay the street urchin 10 coins then pickpocket the villager with an arrow over their head.

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Ask him to join his gang.

10.step: Talk to Ali the Operator (Chat: 1).

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Ask for help in getting a blackjack.

11.step: Equip the Oak blackjack, lure the villager to a secluded room, knockout then pickpocket the Villager.

description: Find a villager lure them into a secluded room. Right-click knockout then pickpocket them.

12.subtitle: Stealing the Jewels
12.step: Talk to Ali the Operator then put on the Desert disguise and gloves.

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: He will tell you to steal a jewel from the mayor's house.
Click on the big cactus to check the house out.

14.step: Use the Keys on the door.

description: Use the key on the door to get into the house.

15.step: Go upstairs and search the landscape picture.

description: Go upstairs.
Second floor near the bed.
Clockwise dial the following: 1-1-2-3-5-8.

17.step: Talk to Ali the Operator to give him the Jewels.

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Give him the jewels to Ali the Operator.
Talk to the Menaphite Thug for information on the traitor.

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: He will tell you to find him and kill him
Give him the jewels to Ali the Operator.
She will tell you to get items for her.

22.step: Talk to Ali the Kebab seller. (Chat: 3-2)

description: She will tell you to get items for her.

23.step: Use the Red hot sauce on the trough.

description: Use the Red hot sauce on the trough to make the camel poop.

24.step: Use the bucket on the dung.

description: After eating the trough the camel will create a dung in the pen. Use the bucket on it.

25.step: Use a coin on the Snake charmer.

description: He will give you a Snake charm and a basket.

26.step: Use the Snake charm on a snake until it goes into the Snake basket.

description: Use the Snake charm on the snake to capture it.
She will take the snake and dung and give you a Hag's poison.

28.step: Use the Hag's poison on the beer on the table in the bar.

description: Use the Hag's poison on the table to poison the beer.

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Tell him the deed is done.

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Prepare yourself to fight a Tough Guy (level 75).

location: southern side by the purple tent.
description: Safespot behind the bush.
They will direct you the Bandit Leader.
Prepare yourself to fight the Bandit Champion (level 70).
Safespot him behind a chair.
Talk to a villager to see if they're happy now.

location: Pollnivneach, in the centre by the well
description: Talk to Ali the Mayor
Talk to Ali Morrisane to finish the quest.

req.name: Items
items: Blueberry special or Premade blurb' sp.

description: Talk to Denulth to start the quest.
He will tell you that the room guard is staying at the bar.

3.step: Talk to Harold. (Chat: 1)

description: He will talk to you.
He will tell you offer him a beer.

5.subtitle: Combination
5.step: Talk to Harold and give him an Asgarian ale and a Blurberry special, then bet him 500gp to get an IOU. (Chat: 3-2)

description: Give him an Asgarian ale and a Blurberry special, then bet him 500gp to get an IOU.

6.step: Read the IOU and use the stone balls on the mechanism to unlock the large door.

description: Place the 5 colored balls as shown in the image to unlock the door.

7.step: Right-click the Archer to talk to him.

description: Go upstairs
Right-click (DON'T ATTACK) and talk to the Archer.

8.subtitle: Secret Path to Death Plateau
8.step: Talk to Saba. (Chat: 2)

description: Ask Saba about another way up Death Plateau.

9.step: Talk to Tenzing. (Chat: 1)

location: North-west from the cave then go south path
description: Agree to get him 10 bread, 10 trout and the spiked boots.

10.step: Talk to Dunstan.

description: He will ask you for an Iron bar and to help his son be an Imperial Guard.
Talk to Denulth to receive a certificate to give to Dunstan.
Give him a Certificate and an Iron bar for Spiked boots.

location: North-west from the cave then go south path
description: Give him 10 bread, 10 trout and the spiked boots.

14.step: Hop the stile and take the path north and around to the east until a message appears in the chat box (NOT the Death Plateau warning)

location: The spot where the message should appear
description: Keep following the path until you receive the message below.
Talk to Denulth to complete the quest.

1.subtitle: Getting started.
1.step: Talk to Sir Amik Varze (Chat option: 1-1)

location: West side of Falador Castle on the third floor.
description: Talk to Sir Amik Varze to start the quest.

2.step: Equip iron chainbody and bronze med helm and go through the door.

description: Teleport to the Monastery using a charge Combat Bracelet and run west up the eastern side of the White Mountain to get to the Black Knights' Fortress. Make sure you equip both Bronze med helm and Iron chainbody.

3.subtitle: Route of the Black Knights' Fortress.
3.step: Push the wall and go up the ladder twice.

description: Push the wall north from the entrance.
Climb up the western ladders heading up.
Climb up the eastern ladders heading up.

4.step: Climb down the ladder south, go through the eastern door and climb up the ladder.

description: Climb down the southern ladders.
Open and go through the door to the south by the altar.
Climb up the ladders in the room.

5.step: Climb down the ladder east, go through the southern door and climb down the ladder.

description: Climb down the eastern ladders.
Go through the southern door out of the room.
Climb down the southern ladders in the room.

6.subtitle: Sabotaging the Witch's Plans
6.step: Listen-at grill on the eastern wall.

description: To the east click 'Listen-at' on the grill

7.step: Go back to the entrance using the same route.

description: Follow the Route of the Black Knight's Fortress steps backwards to get back to the entrance.

8.step: Go through the eastern door. (Chat: 2)

description: A guard will stop you from entering. After entering the door, the Black Knights will attack you.

9.step: Climb-up the ladder and push the wall.

description: Climb up the ladders.
Follow the path east until you reach a wall. Click on it to enter a room

10.step: RIGHT-CLICK and USE the cabbage on the hole (DO NOT EAT IT)

description: Use the cabbage on the hole to trigger a cut scene.

location: West side of Falador Castle on the third floor.
description: Talk to Sir Amik Varze to finish the quest.
Talk to the Cook and he will ask you to get a Bucket of milk, Pot of flour, and an Egg. Talk to the Cook again if you have all the ingredients to finish the quest.
Exit the castle and cross the bridge and follow the path north until you reach the entrance to the cow pen. Use a bucket on a dairy cow.

3.step: Take egg from the chicken coop.

description: Pick-up an egg inside the the chicken coop.
Go across the river past Fred the Farmer's farm to the wheat field and pick some wheat.

5.step: Use the grain with the hopper and operate the controls.

description: Head north inside the mill to the top floor and use the grain on the hopper.
Operate the controls.

6.step: Use the empty pot on the flour bin.

description: Head downstairs to the bottom floor and use the empty pot on the flour bin to get flour.

7.subtitle: Finishing up
7.step: Talk to the Cook.

description: Talk to the Cook with all the ingredients to finish the quest.

8.step: Quest complete!

description: Talk to Captain Tock to start the quest.

2.step: Board the ship south of the pub.

description: Board the ship clicking 'Cross'

3.step: Talk to Captain Tock. (Chat: 1)

description: Speak to him again inside the ship.

location: Cosair Cove, in a building upstairs west from the docks.
description: Talk to Arsen the Thief.

5.step: Talk to Ithoi the Navigator. (Chat: 1)

location: South-west from Cosair Cove by the shore, upstairs
description: Talk to Ithoi the Navigator.

6.subtitle: The Curse
6.step: Talk to Gnooci the Cook, Arsen the Thief, and Cabin Boy Colin. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to Gnooci the Cook.
Talk to Arsen the Thief.
Talk to Cabin Boy Colin.

7.step: Talk to Captain Tock for the ogre artefact. (Chat: 1)

location: Inside the ship by the docks of Corsair Cove.
description: Talk to Captain Tock to get an ogre artefact.

8.step: Talk to Ithoi the Navigator.

location: South-west from Cosair Cove by the shore.
description: Talk to Ithoi the Navigator.

9.step: Use the telescope in Ithoi the Navigator's hut.

location: South-west from Cosair Cove by the shore.
description: Click on the telescope inside Ithoi the Navigator's hut.

10.step: Dig by the lump of sand next to the tree. (Chat: 1)

location: West from Ithoi the Navigator's hut.
description: Dig by the lump of sand to find the doll.

11.step: Enter the dungeon and talk to Chief Tess. (Chat: 1)

location: West from Corsair Cove inside a dungeon.
description: Talk to Chief Tess.

12.step: Talk to Gnooci the Cook, Arsen the Thief, and Cabin Boy Colin.

description: Talk to Gnooci the Cook.
Talk to Arsen the Thief.
Talk to Cabin Boy Colin.

location: Inside the ship by the docks of Corsair Cove.
description: Talk to Captain Tock.
Talk to Gnocci the Cook.
Talk to Arsen the Thief.
Talk to Ithoi the Navigator.

17.step: Talk to Ithoi the Navigator again. (Chat 1-1)

description: Talk to Ithoi the Navigator.

18.step: Use the tinderbox on the driftwood.

description: Go outside the Ihoi the Navigator's hut and use the tinderbox on the driftwood.

location: Inside the ship by the docks of Corsair Cove.
description: Talk to Captain Tock.
Use protect from magic to take no damage.

location: Inside the ship by the docks of Corsair Cove.
description: Talk to Captain Tock.

1.subtitle: Getting started.
1.step: Talk to the Gypsy, give her 1gp and remember the incantation she mentions. (Chat: 1-1-3)

description: Talk to Gypsy and give her 1gp. She will mention an incantation to use to be able to kill the demon later into the quest.
Talk to Sir Prysin.

3.step: Talk to Captain Rovin to get a key. (Chat: 3-1-2-2-3-1)

location: Varrock castle, north-western section on the third floor
description: Go to the third floor and talk to Captain Rovin to get the first key.

4.subtitle: Second key
4.step: Use the bucket of water on the drain.

description: Use the bucket of water on the drain to push the key to the sewers.

5.step: Climb down the manhole.

description: Climb down the manhole to get into Varrock Sewers.

6.step: At the end of the west path, pick-up a key from the floor.

description: Follow the west path to the end and pick-up a key from the floor.

7.subtitle: Third key
7.step: Get 25 un-noted bones and talk to Wizard Traiborn. (Chat: 3-3-2)

description: Talk to Wizard Traiborn.

8.step: Talk to Wizard Traibord to give him 25 un-noted bones for a key.

description: Talk to Wizard Traiborn to give him the bones to receive the third key.

9.subtitle: Delrith
9.step: Talk to Sir Prysin and give him the keys to receive the Silverlight.

description: Talk to Sir Prysin and give him all three keys to receive the Silverlight.

10.step: Wield the Silverlight and go to the Dark wizards.

description: Enter the Dark wizards area to trigger a cut-scene.

11.step: Defeat Delrith using the Silverlight and banish him by using the incantation.

description: Use the incantation the gypsy mentioned. If forgotten, go back to the gypsy ask for the incantation and try again.
Talk to Doric twice and he will give you a bronze pickaxe. Talk to him again to finish the quest if all the ores is in your inventory.
Climb down the ladder to get into the Dwarven Mine.

3.step: Mine 2 iron ores.

description: Using a pickaxe mine iron ore.
Using a pickaxe mine iron ore.

5.step: Mine 6 clay.

description: Using a pickaxe mine clay.

6.subtitle: Finishing up.
6.step: Talk to Doric with the ores.

description: Talk to Doric and give him 6 clay, 4 copper ores, and 2 iron ores to finish the quest.

7.step: Quest complete!

req.name: Requirement (If ore can not be bought)
Recommended
items: Range/Magic Weapon, air rune, and law rune (if Magic level is 33 or higher) or 10,000 coins

description: Talk to Guildmaster to start the quest.
Talk to Oziach.

3.step: Talk to Guildmaster to get the maze key. (Chat: 2-1-1-1-2-3-2-3)

description: Talk to Guildmaster to receive a maze key.

4.step: Map pieces can be obtain in any order.

5.subtitle: Thalzar's map piece.
5.step: Talk to the Oracle. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to the Oracle to start going for the Thalzar's map piece.

6.step: Use silk, lobster pot, unfired bowl and (RIGHT CLICK AND USE) wizard's mind bomb on the magic door.

description: Run south down Ice Mountain and go down some ladders to get into Dwarven Mine.
Use the silk, lobster pot, unfired bowl, and wizard's mind bomb on the magic door to open it.

7.step: Open and search the chest to receive a map piece.

description: Once inside, open and search the chest for the Thalzar's map piece.

8.subtitle: Melzar's map piece.
8.step: Use the maze key to get into the Melzar's maze.

description: Use the maze key from the Guildmaster to get into Melzar's maze.

9.step: Kill a small zombie rat (long tail) for a key and enter the most north-west door and up the ladder.

description: Kill the small zombie rat with a long tail to get a red key.
Enter the most north-west door and climb up the ladder.

10.step: Kill the ghost (hood and no cape) for a key and enter the second door from the north and up the ladder.

description: Kill the ghost with a hood and no cape for an orange key.
Enter the second door from the north and climb up the ladder.

11.step: Kill a skeleton (small, round shield) for a key and enter the western-most door and climb down the ladder 3 times.

description: Kill a skeleton with the small, round shield for a yellow key.
Enter the western-most door.
Climb down the ladder at the end of the path.
Climb down the eastern ladder.
Climb down the eastern ladder.

12.step: Kill zombies for a key and enter the blue door.

description: Kill zombies for a blue key.
Enter the blue door.

13.step: Kill Melzar the Mad for a key and enter the purple door.

description: Kill Melzar the Mad for a purple key.
Enter the purple door.

14.step: Kill the lesser demon to get the key and enter the green door.

description: Kill the lesser demon to get the green key.
Enter the green door.

15.step: Open and search the chest to receive a map piece.

description: Open and search the chest to receive a Melzar's map piece.

16.subtitle: Lozar's map piece.
16.step: Either kill Wormbrain and telegrab the map piece or pay him 10,000 Coins for the map piece.

description: Use Range/Mage to kill Wormbrain and telegrab or talk to him and pay 10,000 Coins for Lozar's map piece.

17.subtitle: Obtaining the boat.
17.step: Talk to Klarense and pay him 2,000 gp. (Chat: 4-1)

description: Talk to Klarense and pay him 2,000 gp for the boat.

18.step: Go on board, climb down the ladder and repair the hole 3 times.

description: Aboard the boat.
Climb down the ladder.
Repair the hole 3 times.

19.subtitle: Defeat Elvarg.
19.step: Talk to Ned with the map in your inventory. (Chat: 1)

description: If you haven't yet use all three map pieces on each other to create a map and talk to Ned.

20.step: Talk to Captain Ned inside the boat you bought. (Chat: 1)

description: Go back to the boat at Port Sarim and talk to Ned and he will sail you to Crandor.

21.step: Climb up the volcano and enter the hole.

description: Climb up the volcano and enter the hole.
Head south the dungeon and enter Elvarg's area. Note: Use the Super antifire potion and anti-dragon shield to not take any damage by her magical fire attacks.
Talk to Oziach to complete the quest.
Talk to Veronica to start the quest.

2.step: Pick-up the fish food on the second floor.

description: Upon entering go upstairs and find fish food in the south room.

3.step: Pick-up the poison at ground floor.

description: Go back downstairs and head to the kitchen with the Witch and poison will be in the south room.

4.step: Use the poison on the fish food.

5.subtitle: Obtaining oil can.
5.step: Search the bookcase in the western room and climb down the ladder.

description: Search the bookcase.
Climb down the ladder.

6.step: Pull lever A and B down; and enter Door 1.

description: Pull lever B, DOWN.
Pull lever A, DOWN.
Enter Door 1.

7.step: Pull lever D down; then enter Door 1.

description: Pull lever D, DOWN.
Enter Door 1.

8.step: Pull lever A and B up; and enter Door 3, 4, & 5.

description: Pull lever A, UP.
Pull lever B, UP.
Enter Door 3.
Enter Door 4.
Enter Door 5.

9.step: Pull lever E and F down; and enter Door 6 & 7.

description: Pull lever E, DOWN.
Pull lever F, DOWN.
Enter Door 6.
Enter Door 7.

10.step: Pull lever C down; and enter Door 7 & 6.

description: Pull lever C, Down.
Enter Door 7.
Enter Door 6.

11.step: Pull lever E up; and enter Door 6, 8, 3, & 9.

description: Pull lever E, UP.
Enter Door 6.
Enter Door 8.
Enter Door 3.
Enter Door 9.
Pickup the oil can.

13.subtitle: Obtaining the pressure gauge and rubber tube.
13.step: Pick-up a spade at ground floor.

description: Go back up stairs, pull the lever, and into the most eastern room to find the spade.
Exit the back door.

15.step: Use the spade on the compost heap to get a key.

description: Use the spade on the compost heap to get a key.

16.step: Use poisoned fish food on the fountain.

description: Use poisoned fish food on the fountain.

17.step: Search the fountain to obtain a pressure gauge.

description: Search the fountain to obtain a pressure gauge.

18.step: Pick-up the rubber tube in the room with the skeleton.

description: Go back inside Draynor Manor and into the room with the skeleton using the key and pick-up the rubber.

19.subtitle: Finishing up.
19.step: Go to the top floor and talk to Professor Oddenstein. (Chat: 1-2)

description: Go back inside Draynor Manor and up the stairs to the very top floor and talk to Professor Oddenstein.

20.step: Talk to Professor Oddenstein again to give him the items.

description: Talk to him again to give him the oil can, pressure gauge, rubber tube and complete the quest.

1.subtitle: Obtain three Goblin mail.
1.step: Go up a ladder near the entrance.

description: Go up the ladder.
Search the crate.

2.step: Go inside the western hut and search the crate.

description: Search the crate.

3.step: Go behind the generals' hut and search the crate.

description: Search the crate.

4.step: Use blue dye on a goblin mail and orange dye on another goblin mail.

5.subtitle: The best looking Goblin Mail.
5.step: Talk to the Goblin Generals. (Chat: 3-3)

description: Talk to the Goblin Generals.

6.step: Keep talking to them until they choose the brown goblin mail. (Chat: 3)

description: Keep talking to them until they choose the brown goblin mail. Each goblin mail will give you a minor cut-scene.

7.step: Quest complete!

1.subtitle: Collecting all four beads.
1.step: Kill imps or buy black, red, white, yellow beads at the grand exchange.

description: Kill imps until they drop all four beads.
Kill imps until they drop all four beads.
Kill imps until they drop all four beads.

location: Southern part of Zeah by the sand crabs.
description: Kill imps until they drop all four beads.

2.subtitle: Finishing up.
2.step: Talk to Wizard Mizgog twice with the beads in inventory. (Chat: 1-1)

description: Talk to Wizard Mizgog two times with the beads in inventory to complete the quest.

3.step: Quest complete!

req.name: Recommended
items: Home Teleport or Fairy Ring A-I-Q

description: Talk to the Squire to start the quest.

location: Varrock Castle in the library section.
description: Talk to Reldo to find out what Imcando dwarfs like.

3.step: Talk to Thurgo twice and give him a redberry pie. (Chat: 2-2-2)

description: Talk to Thurgo two times and he will tell you the items he needs to make a blurite sword.

4.step: Go inside Asgarnian Ice Dungeon, follow the path and mine blurite ore.

description: Climb down the stairs near Thurgo on the hill.
Follow the path to the end of the dungeon until blurite ore can be seen and mine it.

5.subtitle: Getting the Blurite Sword.
5.step: Talk to the Squire.

description: Talk to the Squire.

6.step: Go to Sir Vyvin's room and search the cupboard for a portrait.

description: Climb up the stairs.
Climb up the staircase
When Sir Vyvin is not inside his room, quickly search his cupboard for a portrait.

7.step: Talk to Thurgo twice to obtain the blurite sword. (Chat: 2-2)

description: Talk to Thurgo twice with the 2 iron bars, blurite ore and portrait in inventory to obtain the blurite sword.

8.step: Talk to the Squire.

description: Talk to the Squire to finish the quest.

9.step: Quest complete!

location: Lumbridge Swamp, south-east near the fishing spots.
description: Talk to the Abigale to start the quest.

location: Lumbridge Swamp, south-east near the fishing spots.
description: Board the rowboat.

3.step: Pick-up a bucket and use it on the barrel.

description: Pick-up the bucket by the fountain.
Use the bucket on the barrel.

4.step: Search the barrel to get a key.

description: Search the barrel to get a key.

5.subtitle: Riddle 1
5.step: Enter the manor and pickup the knife.

description: Enter the manor.
Pickup the knife on the table.

6.step: Attempt to open the door with the pink knob.

description: Attempt to open the door with the pink knob.

7.step: Pick-up the note and read it.

description: After the cut-scene, a note will be placed on the floor. Pick it up and read it.

8.step: Use the knife on a painting and search it to obtain a ruby key.

description: Use the knife on a painting.
Search the painting to obtain a ruby key.

9.step: Take a tinderbox from the shelves.

description: Go to the eastern room of the manor and take a tinderbox from the shelves.

10.step: Use the tinderbox on the four unlit candles, then on the barrel of fuse.

description: Use the tinderbox on the first candle.
Use the tinderbox on the second candle.
Use the tinderbox on the third candle.
Use the tinderbox on the fourth candle.
Use the tinderbox on the barrel of fuse.

11.step: Exit the room to trigger an explosion.

description: Open the door and exit the room to trigger an explosion.

12.subtitle: Riddle 2
12.step: Climb over the damaged wall and follow the path north until a cut-scene appears. (Chat: 1)

description: Climb over the damaged wall and follow the path north until a cut-scene appears.

13.step: Pick-up the note and read it.

description: After the cut-scene, a note will be placed on the floor. Pick it up and read it.

14.step: Play D-E-A-D on the piano and search it to obtain a emerald key.

description: Play the notes D-E-A-D on the piano.
Search it to obtain a emerald key.

15.step: Climb back over the damaged wall to get back into the manor.

description: Climb back over the damaged wall to get back into the manor.

16.subtitle: Riddle 3
16.step: Open the door with the green knob, then attempt to open the door with the bandos godsword inside.

description: Go through the door with a green knob.
Attempt to open the door with the bandos godsword inside to trigger a cut-scene.

17.step: Pick-up the note and read it.

description: After the cut-scene, a note will be placed on the floor. Pick it up and read it.

18.step: Use the knife on the unlit fireplace and search the fireplace.

description: Go to the eastern room with the fireplace, then use the knife on fireplace
Search the fireplace.

19.step: Place the gems in order: Sapphire - Diamond - Zenyte - Emerald - Onyx - Ruby.

description: An interface will popup, you must place the gems in the following order: Sapphire - Diamond - Zenyte - Emerald - Onyx - Ruby.

20.step: Search the fireplace again to obtain a sapphire key.

description: Search the fireplace again to obtain a sapphire key.

21.subtitle: Defeat the Killer
21.step: Open the western-most door with the blue knob.

description: Open the western-most door with the blue knob.

22.step: Push the mirror facing the wardrobe the killer is throwing knives from to defeat him.

description: The killer will throw knives from the wardrobe. A small, black fog will appear to signify that the killer will throw a knife from that wardrobe. Push the mirror facing that wardrobe hitting the killer three times to continue to the next step.

23.step: After the cut-scene, take and equip the killer's knife and attack Abigale.

description: After the cut-scene, take and equip the killer's knife and attack Abigale.

24.step: Exit the room and talk to Mandy.

description: Exit the room.
Talk to Mandy to finish the quest.
Talk to Redbeard Frank to start the quest.
Right-click Seaman Lorris and choose pay-fare to pay 30 coins to travel to Karamja.

3.subtitle: Smuggling Karamjan Rum
3.step: Buy Karamjan rum for 30 coins.

description: Trade Zambo to access the beer he is selling. Buy Karamjan Rum for 30 coins.
Pick 10 Bananas from Banana Trees.

5.step: Talk to Luthas. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to Luthas.

6.step: Put the rum and 10 bananas in the crate.

description: Put the rum in the crate.
Right-click and select Fill crate to put 10 bananas inside the crate.

7.step: Talk to Luthas.

description: Talk to Luthas to have the crate ship it to Port Sarim and he will also give you 30 coins.

8.step: Go back to Port Sarim. (Chat: 1-2-1).

description: Right-click the customs officer and pay-fare to pay 30 coins to go back to Port Sarim.

9.subtitle: Port Sarim
9.step: Take the white apron from the fish store.

description: Take the white apron from the fish store.

10.step: Equip the white apron and enter the back room of the food shop. (Chat: 1)

description: The store owner will allow you to enter the back room of the food shop only if you have a white apron equipped.

11.step: Search the crate to get the rum.

description: Search the crate to get the rum.

12.step: Talk to Redbeard Frank to give him rum and receive a key. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to Redbeard Frank to give him rum and receive a key.

13.step: Go upstairs at the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock and use the key on the chest. Read the pirate message.

description: Go to Varrock into the pub and go upstairs.
Use the key on the chest to get a pirate message then read it.

14.subtitle: Buried Treasure
14.step: Pick-up a spade inside the Falador Estate house.

description: Go to Falador and pick-up a spade inside the Falador Estate house.

15.step: Dig at Falador park and kill the Gardener.

description: Dig at Falador park and kill the Gardener.

16.step: Dig again to get a casket.

description: Dig again to get a casket and complete the quest.
Talk to Hassan to start the quest.
Talk to Osman.

3.step: Talk to Leela. (Chat 1-1-2-3)

description: Talk to Leela.

4.subtitle: Creating a Disguise
4.step: Talk to Ned to get the wig from him. (Chat: 1-2-1)

description: Talk to Ned to get the wig from him. (Chat: 1-2-1)

5.step: Talk to Aggie to get skin paste. (Chat: 1-1)

description: Talk to Aggie to get skin paste.

6.step: Use yellow dye on the wig.

7.subtitle: Obtaining the key
7.step: Talk to Lady Keli. (Chat: 1-2-3-1-1)

description: Talk to Lady Keli to get an imprint of the key on the soft clay.

8.step: Talk to Osman. (Chat 1)

description: Talk to Osman to duplicate the key.

9.step: Talk to Leela to get the key.

description: Talk to Leela to get the key.

10.subtitle: Rescuing Prince Ali
10.step: Talk to Joe. (Chat: 1))

description: Talk to Joe and give him beer.
Use rope on Lady Keli to tie her up.
Use key on cell door.
Talk to Prince Ali.
Talk to Hassan to finish the quest.
Talk to Father Aereck to start the quest.
Talk to Father Urhney to obtain a Ghost speak amulet.

3.step: Equip the Ghostspeak amulet, open the coffin and talk to the ghost. (Chat: 1)

description: Equip the Ghostspeak amulet, open the coffin.
Talk to the ghost.

4.subtitle: Obtaining the Ghost's Skull
4.step: Search the altar to receive a ghost's skull.

description: Climb down the ladders of Wizards' Tower to get into the basement.
A skeleton will start attacking you for taking the skull. You can choose to fight it or run away.

5.step: Use skull on coffin.

description: Use skull on coffin to finish the quest.

6.step: Quest complete!

description: Talk to Romeo to start the quest.

location: Upstairs in a house west of the bank of Varrock.
description: Talk to Juliet to receive a love letter.

3.step: Talk to Romeo.

description: Talk to Romeo to show him a love letter.
Talk to Father Lawrence.

5.subtitle: Love Potion
5.step: Pick Cadava berries.

location: South-east of Varrock by the mine
description: Pick Cadava berries.

6.step: Talk to the Apothecary. (Chat: 3-1)

location: Varrock Apothecary, south of the west bank
description: Talk to the Apothecary.

7.step: Talk to the Apothecary again to give him Cadava berries and receive a love potion.

location: Varrock Apothecary, south of the west bank
description: Talk to the Apothecary to receive a love potion.

8.step: Talk to Juliet.

location: Upstairs in a house west of the bank of Varrock.
description: Talk to Juliet to give her the love potion.

9.step: Talk to Romeo.

description: Talk to Romeo to finish the quest.

10.step: Quest complete!

req.name: Requirements
items: A partner to complete the quest with. Join clan chat 'Osrs Soa' to find a partner

req.name: Additional Notes
items: Only do the section of the quest to the gang you chose to join.

description: Talk to Reldo to start the quest and to join the Phoenix Gang.

2.step: Search the bookcase with the blue book and read it.

description: Search the bookcase with the blue book and read it.

3.step: Talk to Reldo. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to Reldo.
Talk to Baraek.

5.step: Climb down the trapdoor at the Phoenix Gang Hideout.

description: Climb down the trapdoor at the Phoenix Gang Hideout.

6.step: Talk to Straven. (Chat: 1-1)

location: Varrock at the Phoenix Gang Hideout.
description: Talk to Straven.

7.step: Kill Jonny the beard and pick-up the Intel report.

description: Kill Jonny the beard and pick-up the Intel report.
Pick-up the Intel report.

8.step: Talk to Straven to give him the Intel Report.

location: Varrock at the Phoenix Gang Hideout.
description: Talk to Straven to give him the Intel Report.

9.step: Open the chest in the hideout to obtain the half of the Shield of Arrav.

location: Varrock in the Phoenix Gang Hideout.
description: Open the chest in the hideout to obtain the half of the Shield of Arrav.

10.step: Give the Weapon store key to your partner.

location: Varrock in the Phoenix Gang Hideout.
description: Trade or use the Weapon store key on your partner so they can do their part of the quest.

location: South of Varrock by the entrance.
description: Talk to Charlie the Tramp to join the Black Arm Gang.

location: South-west corner of Varrock at the Black Arm Gang hideout.
description: Talk to Katrine.

13.step: Get a Weapon Store Key from your partner.

description: Your partner, who joined the Phoenix Gang should be giving you a Weapon Store Key.

14.step: Use key on the door and climb up the ladder.

description: Use key your parner gave you on the door and climb up the ladder.

15.step: Kill the Weaponsmaster and pick-up 2 Phoenix crossbows.

description: Kill the Weaponsmaster.
Pick-up 2 Phoenix crossbows.

location: South-west of Varrock at the Black Arm Gang hideout.
description: Talk to Katrine.

17.step: Go upstairs in the hideout then open and search the cupboard to receive half of the Shield of Arrav.

location: South-west corner of Varrock at the Black Arm Gang hideout.
description: Go upstairs in the hideout.

location: Upstairs of the Black Arm Gang hideout.
description: Open and search the cupboard to receive half of the Shield of Arrav.

18.subtitle: Both Gang Members
18.step: Talk to the Curator Haig Halen with the Shield half in inventory to get two certificates.

description: Phoenix Gang
Black Arm Gang

19.step: Give one and receive half certificate from your partner.

description: Phoenix Gang, use/trade your partner one of your certificates and they should do the same.
Black Arm Gang, use/trade your partner one of your certificates and they should do the same.

20.step: Use both halves of the certificate on each other to make a completed certificate.

description: Phoenix Gang
Black Arm Gang
Talk to Morgan to start the quest.

2.step: Go upstairs and take garlic from the cupboard.

description: Go upstairs.
Take garlic from the cupboard.

3.step: Talk to Dr. Harlow twice to give him a beer and receive a stake. (Chat: 2)

description: Talk to Dr. Harlow twice to give him a beer and receive a stake.

4.step: Bring a garlic, hammer, and stake to Draynor Manor and go downstairs.

description: Go downstairs.

5.step: Open the coffin and defeat Count Draynor.

description: Open the coffin.
Defeat Count Draynor.

6.step: Quest complete!

req.name: Items
items: 3 coins (to buy an eye of newt)

description: Talk to Morgan to start the quest.

2.subtitle: Obtaining the Ingredients

description: Kill a rat and pick-up a rat's tail.

description: Kill a giant rat
Cook it twice for burnt meat.

4.step: Pick an onion from the onion field.

description: Pick an onion from the onion field.

5.step: Buy an eye of newt from Betty for 3 coins.

description: Buy an eye of newt from Betty for 3 coins.

6.step: Talk to Betty with all 4 ingredients in inventory.

description: Talk to Betty with all 4 ingredients in inventory.

7.step: Drink from the cauldron.

description: Drink from the cauldron to finish the quest.

8.step: Quest complete!

description: Talk to Veos to start the quest.

3.step: Talk to Leenz. (Chat: 3, 3)

description: Talk to Leenz.
Talk to Regath.

description: Talk to Munty.

description: Talk to Jennifer.

7.step: Talk to Horace. (Chat: 4, 3)

description: Talk to Horace.

8.step: Talk to Veos to receive a Mysterious orb.

description: Talk to Veos to receive a Mysterious orb.

9.step: Go to the dark altar and activate the Mysterious Orb.

description: Activate the Mysterious Orb by the dark altar.

10.step: Talk to Veos (Chat: 3)

description: Talk to Veos to finish the quest.
Talk to Kaqemeex to start the quest.
Talk to Sanfew.

3.step: Use all four meats on the Cauldron in Taverley Dungeon.

description: Climb down the stairs to enter Taverly Dungeon.
Spam open the door two times until both suit of armor animate to life. Then open the door again to go through the gate.
Use a raw bear meat, a raw rat meat, a raw beef, a raw chicken on the cauldron.
Talk to Sanfew.

5.subtitle: Finishing up
5.step: Talk to Kaqemeex.

description: Talk to Kaqemeex.

6.step: Quest complete!

description: Talk to Brother Omad to start the quest.

2.subtitle: Finding Omad's blanket
2.step: Walk into the stone circle to make ladders appear, go down it.

description: Go down the ladders.

3.step: Pick-up a Child's blanket.

description: Follow the south path and pick-up a Child's blanket
Talk to Brother Omad two times.

5.step: Talk to Brother Cedric three times. (Chat: 2).

description: Talk to Brother Cedric three times to give him a Jug of Water and the Logs (regular).

6.subtitle: Finishing up
6.step: Talk to Brother Omad. (Chat: 1-2)

description: Talk to Brother Omad to finish the quest.

7.step: Quest complete!

description: Talk to Observatory professor to start the quest.

2.subtitle: Fixing the Observatory
2.step: Talk to the Observatory professor three more times.

description: Talk to the Observatory professor three times to give him three planks, bronze bar and molten glass.

3.step: Go down the stairs on the hill to the east.

location: East of the Observatory Reception Room
description: Go down the stairs.

4.step: Search all the chests until you find the goblin kitchen key.

description: Search all the chests until you find the goblin kitchen key. The key is in a different place for every player.

5.step: Prod the sleeping guard, then defeat him.

description: Prod the sleeping guard to wake him up, then defeat him.

6.step: Open the gate and inspect the goblin stove.

description: Open the gate and inspect the goblin stove.

7.step: Talk to the Observatory professor. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to the Observatory professor to get the molten glass and mould back.

8.step: Use the molten glass on the lens mould.

9.step: Talk to the Observatory professor. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to the Observatory professor to give him the new lens.

10.step: Take the stairs in the south end of the dungeon.

description: Go upstairs to get into the Observatory.

11.subtitle: Finishing up
11.step: Go upstairs and view the telescope.

description: Go upstairs again to the telescope.
View the telescope.

12.step: Talk to the professor and identify the constellation you saw [see below]. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to the professor and he will ask you what constellation you saw. The constellation you get will determine the reward.
Aquarius
25 Water runes, uncut sapphire
Aries
875 Attack experience, uncut sapphire
Cancer
Amulet of defence, uncut sapphire
Capricorn
875 Strength experience, uncut sapphire
Gemini
Black 2h sword, uncut sapphire
Leo
3 Law runes, uncut sapphire
Libra
3 Law runes, uncut sapphire
Pisces
3 Tuna, uncut sapphire
Sagittarius
3 Tuna, uncut sapphire
Scorpio
3 Tuna, uncut sapphire
Taurus
Super strength(1), uncut sapphire
Virgo
875 Defence experience, uncut sapphire
Talk to King Arthur to start the quest.
Talk to Sir Gawain.

3.step: Talk to Sir Lancelot.

description: Climb up the stairs onto the second floor and talk to Sir Lancelot.

location: House in Catherby, north of the bank.
description: Pick-up the Insect Repellant inside a house at Catherby.

5.subtitle: Keep Le Faye Castle
5.step: Hide-in the crate by the candle shop.

description: Get in the crate by the candle shop.

6.step: Attack Sir Modred.

location: Top floor in Keep Le Faye castle.
description: Jump out of the crate and head to the top floor and attack sir mordred.

7.step: Spare Sir Modred's life. (Chat: 1-2)

location: Top floor in Keep Le Faye castle.
description: After getting Sir Modred low health and Morgan Le Faye will appear and ask you to spare his life and in return she will tell you how to release Merlin.

8.subtitle: Black candle
8.step: Use Insect Repellant on the Hive and a Bucket to get Bucket of Wax.

location: South of Camelot Castle at the Beehives.
description: Pick-up a bucket at the hive, then use the insect repellant on the hive then a Bucket on the hive to get a Bucket of Wax.

9.step: Talk to the candle maker two times to get a Black Candle. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to the candle maker two times to get a Black Candle.

10.subtitle: Excalibur
10.step: Talk to the lady of the lake in Taverly. (Chat: 3)

description: Talk to the lady of the lake.

11.step: Go to Port Sarim, enter the jewellery shop and give the beggar your bread. (Chat: 1)

description: Attempt to open the jewellery shop and a beggar will appear.
Agree to give him bread to receive the Excalibur.

12.subtitle: Ritual
12.step: Go to Varrock and check chaos altar's inscription.

description: Go to Varrock and right-click to check the chaos altar's inscription to complete the ritual.

13.step: Light the black candle and drop bat bones on the star.

location: North-east of Camelot at the ritual site.
description: Go back Camelot Castle to the ritual site, and light the black candle and drop the bat bones on the star to start the ritual.

14.step: The magic words are 'Snarthon Candtrick Termanto'.

location: North-east of Camelot at the ritual site.
description: Use the following magic words, 'Snarthon Candtrick Termanto' to eliminate the spirit.

15.subtitle: Finishing Up
15.step: Equip the excalibur and smash the giant crystal with Excalibur.

description: Use the stairs to get to the top of the castle.
Equip the excalibur and smash the giant crystal Merlin is surrounded in to free him.
Talk to King Arthur to finish the quest.
Talk to Edmond to start the quest.

2.step: Talk to Alrena to give dwellberries for a gas mask.

description: Talk to Alrena to give her dwellberries for a gas mask.

3.step: Take the picture of Elena off of the table.

description: Pick-up the picture of Elena off the table.
Talk to Edmond.

5.step: Use 4 buckets of water on the mud patch.

description: Use all 4 buckets of water on the mud patch to create a softer ground to dig through.

6.step: Use a spade on the softened ground.

description: Use a spade on the softened ground to get through it.

7.step: Attempt to open the grill.

description: Attempt to open the grill to be able to attach the rope in the next step.

8.step: Use a rope on the grill.

description: Use a rope on the grill.

9.step: Talk to Edmond.

description: Ask Edmond to help you pull the grill off.

10.step: Put on the gasmask and climb up the pipe.

description: Since Edmond will not allow to climb up the pipe without a gasmask, put on the gasmask and climb up the pipe.

11.subtitle: Finding Elena
11.step: Talk to Jethick for a book. (Chat: 1-1)

description: Talk to Jethick for a book.
Talk to Martha.

location: Upstairs of the north house in West Ardougne.
description: Go upstairs and talk to Milli.

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Go to the south building with X marks and attempt to open the door only to be stopped.

location: Large building north of town square in West Ardougne.
description: Talk to the clerk.

location: Large building north of town square in West Ardougne.
description: Go through the door and talk to the Bravek.

17.step: Use chocolate dust on the bucket of milk (DON'T EAT) and then add snape grass.

18.step: Use the hangover cure on Bravek to get a warrant. (Chat 3)

location: Large building north of town square in West Ardougne.
description: Use the hangover cure on Bravek to get a warrant.

19.subtitle: Rescuing Elena
19.step: Enter the Mourners' house ('X' on the doors).

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Enter the Mourners' house ('X' on the doors)

20.step: Search the barrel west of the staircase for a small key.

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Enter the Mourners' house ('X' on the doors) and show them the warrant to get inside.

21.step: Go downstairs, enter the cell and talk to Elena.

location: South building with X marks in West Ardougne.
description: Go downstairs, enter the cell and talk to Elena.

22.subtitle: Finishing up
22.step: Go back down the manhole and speak to Edmond.

description: Go back down the manhole and speak to Edmond to finish the quest.

req.name: Items
items: Priest gown top and Priest gown bottom or 10gp

description: Talk to Elena to start the quest.
Talk to Jerico.

3.step: Search cupboard for bird feed.

description: Search cupboard for bird feed.
Pick-up a pigeon cage from the backyard.

5.step: Use bird feed on the watchtower fence.

description: Stand on the corner where the spiked fence meets and use bird feed on the watchtower fence.

6.step: Release the pigeon cage by the spiked fence.

description: Release the pigeon cage by the spiked fence.

7.step: Talk to Omart. (Chat: 1)

description: Talk to Omart to get into West Ardougne.

8.subtitle: Infiltrating the Mourner Headquarters
8.step: Pick-up rotten apple.

description: Pick-up rotten apple.

9.step: Squeeze through the fence.

description: Squeeze through the fence into the backyard.

10.step: Use the rotten apple (DON'T EAT) on the cauldron.

description: Use the rotten apple (DON'T EAT) on the cauldron.

11.step: Search cupboard for a Doctors' gown.

description: Search cupboard for a Doctors' gown.

12.step: Equip the Doctors' gown, go back to the Headquarters and open the door.

description: Equip the Doctors' gown, go back to the Headquarters and open the door.

13.step: Go upstairs and kill a Mourner for a key.

description: Go upstairs and kill a Mourner for a key.

14.step: Use the key on the gate.

location: Upstairs of Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne.
description: Use the key on the gate.

15.step: Search the crates to receive Elena's Distillator.

location: Upstairs of Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne.
description: Search the crates to receive Elena's Distillator.

16.step: Talk to Elena to give her the Distiller. (Talk to Kilron to get over the fence)

description: Talk to Kilron to get to East Ardougne.
Talk to Elena to give her the Distiller.

17.subtitle: Obtaining the touch paper
17.step: Bank all 4 samples then teleport to Falador/Draynor. (Teleporting with samples will break them, so make sure you bank them before you teleport!)

description: Bank all 4 samples then teleport to Falador/Draynor. (Teleporting with samples will break them, so make sure you bank them before you teleport!)

location: Draynor Village (picture) or Falador East Bank
description: Withdraw all 4 samples and speak to the Chemist for touch paper. (Chat: 2-2-2)

19.step: Talk to the Chemist for touch paper. (Chat: 2-2-2).

description: Talk to the Chemist for touch paper.
Give Da Vinci the Ethenea.

21.step: Give Chancy the Liquid honey Liquid honey. (Chat: 2)

description: Give Chancy the Liquid honey Liquid honey.
Give Hops the Sulphuric broline.

23.step: Bank the Plague sample before teleporting to Varrock!

location: Draynor Village (picture) or Falador East Bank
description: Bank the Plague sample before teleporting to Varrock!

24.step: Trade Thessalia for a Priest Top and Priest Gown for 10gp.

description: Trade Thessalia for a Priest Top and Priest Gown for 10gp if you don't have one.
Withdraw the Plague sample.

location: South-eastern at gated area in Varrock
description: Withdraw the Plague sample.

27.step: Talk to Hops, Da Vinci and Chancy to get the vials back.

description: Talk to Hops.
Talk to Da Vinci.
Talk to Chancy.

28.step: Equip the Priest gown and talk to Guidor. (Chat: 1-2)

location: South-eastern at gated area in Varrock
description: Equip the Priest gown and talk to Guidor.
Talk to Elena.
Talk to King Lathas to finish the quest.
